price: 30. Y cuando les llegó la verdad, dijeron: “Esto no es sino brujería y no creeremos en ello”.
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu qālū hādhā siḥ'run wa-innā bihi kāfirūna
